Cheiren:
You have brought back 10 Soul Core Containing Evil Spirits.. If I combine the power of this core with this pendant... Well, these are the Protection Soul's Pendant. These are essential to confront the head of Raguna Orc Baranka. Without these items, one can never be able to endure the energy of the evil spirit.
If you go to the altar of Kasha and kill it, it will be of a great help to weaken the evil spirit.
Anything else?
Settle other items.
Say that you quit your mission
Continue with the mission
